title: Amnesiac Serial Killer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Stab someone or remember who you were.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> If you stab someone, their role will show up as Forgotten (1622) and their last will will be hidden.

> You can only remember Serial Killer faction roles.

desc:
Post 1160
*"Ugh... who am I? Oh yeah, that's right, I'm a Fiery Serial Killer, how could I forget?"*
